How We Picked

FAQ

What size air fryer works best under $200?

A 4-6 quart air fryer offers the best balance of capacity, counter space, and price in this range.

Are budget air fryers slower than premium models?

Not always. Many mid-priced models heat quickly, but may trade off advanced presets or build materials.
